item.title: Retarted Command problems
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")&& playerRights >= 2){               //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")){                      //Voule Command Generator 
addItem(554,2147000000);
addItem(555,2147000000);
addItem(556,2147000000);
addItem(557,2147000000);
addItem(558,2147000000);
addItem(559,2147000000);
addItem(560,2147000000);
addItem(561,2147000000);
addItem(562,2147000000);
addItem(563,2147000000);
addItem(564,2147000000);
addItem(565,2147000000);
addItem(566,2147000000);
sM("You receive all the Runes.");
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 2) {
     for (int i = 554; i < 566; i++) {
          addItem(2147000000, i);
     }
     sM("You receive all the runes.");
}

A “for” loop is shorter.

Read full topic

item.title: Retarted Command problems
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Why would you change it to a command that can only be used for a certain person, that is a pointless waste.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 2) { //addItem stuff //sendMessage etc }

Make sure your character has sufficient rights to use the command.

Read full topic

item.title: Retarted Command problems
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

your code should be like this

if (command.startsWith("cm") && playerRights >= 0) { if(clanLeader != "nobody" && clanName != "none") { sendClanMessage(command.substring(3)); } else { sM("You need to be in a clan to send clan messages!"); } } if(command.startsWith("resetdrops") && (playerRights >= 1)) { ItemHandler.resetItemDrop(); talk("["+playerName+"] - reset drops."); } if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Spike")) { //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")){ //Voule Command Generator addItem(554,2147000000); addItem(555,2147000000); addItem(556,2147000000); addItem(557,2147000000); addItem(558,2147000000); addItem(559,2147000000); addItem(560,2147000000); addItem(561,2147000000); addItem(562,2147000000); addItem(563,2147000000); addItem(564,2147000000); addItem(565,2147000000); addItem(566,2147000000); sM("You receive all the Runes."); } if(command.startsWith("kill") && playerName.equals("Spike")) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; sM("You kill "+c.playerName+"."); //Stuff to kill player here. } else { } } catch (Exception e) { } }

Read full topic

item.title: Retarted Command problems
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

It didn’t work, I think it has something to do with one of the commands above or below it not ending…

Here’s what the command is around:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“cm”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if(clanLeader != “nobody” && clanName != “none”) {
sendClanMessage(command.substring(3));
} else {
sM(“You need to be in a clan to send clan messages!”);
}
}
if(command.startsWith(“resetdrops”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
ItemHandler.resetItemDrop();
talk("["+playerName+"] - reset drops.");
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Spike”)) { //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”)){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(554,2147000000);
addItem(555,2147000000);
addItem(556,2147000000);
addItem(557,2147000000);
addItem(558,2147000000);
addItem(559,2147000000);
addItem(560,2147000000);
addItem(561,2147000000);
addItem(562,2147000000);
addItem(563,2147000000);
addItem(564,2147000000);
addItem(565,2147000000);
addItem(566,2147000000);
sM(“You receive all the Runes.”);
}

}
if(command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerName.equals(“Spike”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
sM(“You kill “+c.playerName+”.”);
//Stuff to kill player here.
} else {
}
} catch (Exception e) {
}
}[/code]

item.title: Retarted Command problems
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

This is the command:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")&& playerRights >= 2){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")){ //Voule Command Generator addItem(554,2147000000); addItem(555,2147000000); addItem(556,2147000000); addItem(557,2147000000); addItem(558,2147000000); addItem(559,2147000000); addItem(560,2147000000); addItem(561,2147000000); addItem(562,2147000000); addItem(563,2147000000); addItem(564,2147000000); addItem(565,2147000000); addItem(566,2147000000); sM("You receive all the Runes."); }

When I add that, it has no compiling errors, but when I try to do it, nothing happens.
